ShortDescription.Value: Enables multiple upgrade options for your roads.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Description This mod enables some additional upgrade modes for your roads, giving you full control on the type of roads you can build without needing to precisely terraform beforehand.
These upgrades are available in the in-game upgrade mode for roads and can be used exactly like any other upgrade mode (e.g. Grass or Wide Sidewalk).
The mod currentyl supports the following modes: - Quay - Retaining Wall - Elevated - Tunnel
These upgrades can be applied to: - Roads - Pedestrian Paths - Public Transport Roads - Train Tracks - Tram Tracks - Subway Tracks
